snap(-25,0,25)

sky(198,226,255)
fog(206,244,255) 
ground(183,221,208)

fadefrom(6000)

name(Do The Snake Dance)
nlaps(7)

set(10,0,0,0)p
set(10,0,5600,0)
chk(40,0,5600,0)
set(12,1520,11230,-30)p
chk(40,3040,14060,0)
set(13,1520,16890,30)p
chk(40,0,19720,0)
set(12,1520,22550,-30)p
chk(40,3040,25380,0)
set(13,1520,28210,30)p
chk(40,0,31040,0)
set(12,1520,33870,-30)p
chk(40,3040,36700,0)
set(10,3040,39500,0)p
set(14,3040,44050,-90)pt
set(10,-1510,44050,90)p
set(29,-6474,44050,90)pr
set(10,-11438,44050,90)p
set(10,-17038,44050,90)p
set(14,-21588,44050,0)pt
chk(40,-21588,42300,0)
set(10,-21588,39500,0)p
set(10,-21588,33900,0)
set(26,-21588,33900,180)pr
set(10,-21588,28300,0)p
set(10,-21588,22700,0)p
set(10,-21588,17100,0)p
set(32,-21288,17100,180)
chk(40,-21588,14300,0)
set(10,-21588,11500,0)
set(32,-21888,11500,180)pr
set(10,-21588,5900,0)
set(32,-21288,5900,180)pr
set(23,-21588,3100,0)
set(32,-21888,2100,180)pr

set(23,-21588,-2800,180)p
set(14,-21588,-4550,90)p
set(10,-17038,-4550,90)p
set(10,-11438,-4550,90)
set(10,-9100,-4550,90)
chk(40,-11438,-4550,90)
set(10,-4550,-4550,90)p
set(14,0,-4550,180)p

set(24,-10700,2200,180)po
set(15,-10700,5000,0)p
set(15,-10700,9600,0)p
set(15,-10700,15200,0)p
set(16,-10700,20800,0)p
fix(41,-10700,20800,-2000,0)s
set(15,-10700,26400,0)p

set(34,-10700,24600,0)
set(34,-10700,17000,180)
set(15,-10700,32000,0)
set(24,-10700,34800,0)po

maxr(13,5000,-13600)
maxb(6,-16000,-21400)
maxl(13,-23800,-13600)
maxt(6,46400,-21400)
